body.p:
Frankfort. Ky. Aug 22. 1861
Dr. John M. Johnson
Paducah Ky.

You will please go to Cairo without delay, enquire into the facts connected with the arrest of two of our citizens upon our own soil fo by troops from Cairo, reported to me by D. G. Fowler of Paducah. Lay the matter before Gen Prentiss, protest against the act and obtain if possible the release -- Report as soon as may be.
Copy of Letter to Dr Jno M. Johnson
